active.description: Determines whether the counter is visible or not.

transition.type: | { component: Component }  | string  | boolean  | (TransitionProps & { component: Component })
transition.description: Sets the component transition. Can be one of the built in or custom transition.
transition.description_zh: 设置组件过渡。可以是内置过渡或自定义过渡之一。

slots.name: default
slots.params: { counter: string; max: string | number; value: string | number }
